Text:
@ cpuireland - Yes. I started using x264 CRF encoding.  Same standard as scene releases except I go an extra step to mux it into an MP4 rather than an MKV. If the MP4 gives you playback issues on your WDEP try using MKVmerge GUI to mux it into an MKV.  Only takes a minute to do so and it's not converting anything; only putting the x264 and AC3 from the MP4 into an MKV container.  I don't have a WDEP and make releases specifically for a PC and PS3.

@falasteen - out of my control and nothing I can do about that.  Sorry?
